price: Na Qur'ani tumeigawanya sehemu mbali mbali ili uwasomee watu kwa kituo, na tumeiteremsha kidogo kidogo.
arabic: وَقُرۡءَانٗا فَرَقۡنَٰهُ لِتَقۡرَأَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ عَلَىٰ مُكۡثٖ وَنَزَّلۡنَٰهُ تَنزِيلٗا
footnotes: Na hii Qur'ani tumeigawa na tumeiteremsha kipande kipande kwa muda mrefu, ili uwasomee watu kwa taratibu wapate kuifahamu. Tumeiteremsha kidogo kidogo kwa utulivu bila ya matatanisho.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqur'ānan faraqnāhu litaqra-ahu ʿalā al-nāsi ʿalā muk'thin wanazzalnāhu tanzīlan
